page.title: 04Shipham Service Station.
page.content: We walked across the busy road in partners to the Garage. Mr.Tout was happy to stop his work on a car to let us ask some questions. He had owned it for the last 7 years and now he does M.O.T. testing, repairing, servicing, car hiring and selling as well as filling cars with petrol. On the large forecourt there is what looks like a huge umbrella, under which three pumps operate. He sells about 200 gallons a day and his 6 tanks hold 9,000 gallons underground. He serves about 50 customers a day and 2 men work for him. On the front of the building he has lots of safety signs like "No Smoking" and "Switch Off Engine". The price of 4 Star petrol is Â£1.99 per gallon and this is what he sells the most. He also has a shop for selling sweets and accessories.
